explanations.neural network: The paper discusses the interpretability of neural network-based large models in FinTech scenarios.
explanations.deep learning: The paper focuses on large language models, which are a subset of deep learning models.
explanations.Large Language Model: The paper explicitly mentions and investigates the application of large language models in FinTech scenarios.
explanations.LLM: LLM is an abbreviation for Large Language Model, which is the main focus of the paper.
